FuncDef:
The qos link-adjustment link-layer-exclude command configures the CAR and statistics functions based on layer 3 packet length.
The undo qos link-adjustment link-layer-exclude command cancels the configuration.
By default, the CAR and statistics functions based on layer 2 and layer 3 packet length are not configured.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the CAR and statistics functions based on layer 3 packet length, run the qos link-adjustment link-layer-exclude command.
